name: sample2
blocksXml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><block type="text_print" x="-68" y="109"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Aby wyświetlić stan komponentu podaj komendę: </field></block></value><next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">button1 - stan pierwszego przycisku</field></block></value><next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">button2 - stan drugiego przycisku</field></block></value><next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">knob - stan pokrętła</field></block></value><next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">temp - stan czujnika temperatury</field></block></value><next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">bright - stan czujnika oświetlenia</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="copernicus_event_text_input" x="373" y="161"><statement name="REACTION_BLOCK"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="4" else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_compare"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="copernicus_get_text_input"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">button1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="copernicus_get_button1"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="logic_compare"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="copernicus_get_text_input"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">button2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="copernicus_get_button2"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="logic_compare"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="copernicus_get_text_input"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">knob</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="copernicus_get_knob"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF3"><block type="logic_compare"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value
